text: Piercarlo Beroldi (8 June 1928 - 21 October 2015) was an Italian former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Italian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Italy Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy
